Description.Text: Set along the beaches of charming Bophut Bay, Deva Samui Resort & Spa is an indulgent getaway for fun, family or romance on Thailand's glittering island gem. The low-rise, resort-style main buidling offers stylish yet cozy rooms and suites, with many featuring direct pool access and jacuzzi. For added luxury, private pool villas are scattered throughout the resort's gardens and beachfront, combining spacious, open design with all the comforts to ensure the ultimate island escape.

The resort is located near Cheongmon Beach in Plailaem area. It is only three kilometres from Samui Airport and just 15 minutes drive from Chaweng Beach. Outrigger Koh Samui Resort & Spa is also very close to many other great attractions such as the Big Buddha, Fisherman Village,and Koh Pha-ngan Pier.

Superior - 27 sqm, Decorated in soothing beige and blue, the stylish rooms offer a lounge bed seating area, king sized bedding and walk-in shower.
Deluxe Room - Deva Samui Resort & Spa offers Deluxe Room, spacious 55 sqm. Delightfully situated, looking out onto the pool and gardens. A furnished terrace features and outdoor Jacuzzi. In-room hospitality and facilities include flat screen 32' television with cable TV, DVD player, telephone, mini-bar, Free Wi-Fi connections, safety deposit box, coffee and tea making facilities, bathroom amenities.
Grand Deluxe - Deva Samui Resort & Spa offers Grand Deluxe, delightful location with 67 sqm of air conditioned living space. A large balcony featuring a Jacuzzi, and overlooking the garden and pool. Facilities include flat screen 32', cable TV, DVD player, telephone and Free Wi-Fi connections, safety deposit box, coffee and tea making facilities with mini-bar and microwave.
Grand Deluxe Pool Access - Deva Samui Resort & Spa offers Grand Deluxe Pool Access, delightful location with 67 sqm of air conditioned living space. A large balcony located on the ground floor with direct access to the swimming pool. Facilities include flat screen 32', cable TV, DVD player, telephone and Free Wi-Fi connections, safety deposit box, coffee and tea making facilities with mini-bar and microwave.
Pool Villa - 113 sqm - These private pool villas feature airy living and dining areas along with bathrooms offering indoor and outdoor rain showers as well as a bathtub with Jacuzzi. In-villa hospitality and facilities include flat screen 42' television, cable TV, DVD player and IPod docking system, telephone and Free Wi-Fi connections, safety deposit box, mini-bar and coffee and tea making facilities
Grand Pool Villa - 147 sqm - Our Grand Pool Villa of Deva Samui Resort & Spa are situated on the upper front of the resort and are the closest to the beach. The villas showcase beach-side interiors enhanced with touches of nature - reflected in planes of wood, water, bamboo, sand, and shells. Grand Pool Villa's feature both a separate indoor and outdoor rain shower as well as a bathtub with Jacuzzi. Facilities include flat screen 42' television, DVD player, IPod docking system, telephone and Free Wi-Fi connections, mini-bar, safety deposit box, coffee and tea making facilities and a private pool, as well as private sun bathing area
